SpIn Functions

Function to acquire spectral information.

class SpIn_Class.Spectra(wavelength, flux, error=False)

Initializes the Spectra Class

voight_params

sub_spectrum

A zoomed-in region cutout of spectrum based on window size.

Type

continuum_divide

A continuum-divided spectrum.

Type

specutils.Spectrum1D

Fitting(line_wavelength, window, limit_bound=<Quantity 10. Angstrom>)

Function to fit a Voigt profile to line center provided and window region

Parameters

  • line_wavelength (float) – Has to have units of Angstroms.

  • window (float) – Has to have units of Angstroms.

  • limit_bound (float, optional) – Changes line center bounds to fit within a narrower region. Defaults to 10*u.AA.

continuum_fit(plot=True)

Fits the continuum and plots it.

Parameters

plot (bool, optional) – Plots the spectrum and the continuum fit. Defaults to True.

line_finding(threshold, continuum=True)

Function to find extreme absorption or emission lines.

Parameters

  • threshold (float) – The treshold a flux value must be above or below to be considered an emission or absorption feature.

  • continuum (bool, optional) – Set to False if you didn’t use the continuum_fit function on the spectra. Defaults to True.

Returns

Table of emission and absorption lines. Column headers: Line center (line_center), line type (line_type) and index of line center (line_center_index) are stored for each line.

Return type

lines (QTable)

plotting_spec()

Plotting function

Returns

Plots the sub_spectrum and the best fit Voight profile.

Return type

ax object
